entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
